column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here a few weeks ago for an impromptu girls night and had a really good experience. It was crowded on a Saturday night--not in a bad way
column2: but in a "this place is tasty and popular" way. We enjoyed the black raspberry sangria to start out with and
column4: were not rushed to order by our server. Got some great recommendations for both vegetarian and meat dishes
column5: and away we went. For three people I think we ended up with 6 dishes and two desserts. Highlights were stuffed mushroom caps and the goat cheese in tomato sauce
column6: and of course the dessert flan. I definitely recommend this restaurant
column7: just make sure you get a reservation ahead of time!
